title: Construction Worker to TETO Brasil
description: TETO is a nonprofit organization that mobilizes youth volunteers to fight extreme poverty in Latin America, by constructing transitional housing and implementing social inclusion programs. In 2023, TETO achieved the milestone of constructing 500 houses in the state of Paraná.
experiences: Database update and structuring of data compilation of socio-economic surveys
Coordinator of Community Diagnosis, a sort of local census (May to June, 2016)
Group Leader in COLETA 2015, fundraising campaign (May 2015)
Group Leader for the application of ECO Socioeconomic Survey (June 2015)
Volunteer in Emergency Houses Construction Team (May and October 2015; April 2017)
Volunteer of the Detection and Diagnosis Group, GIS analysis (February 2015 to July 2016)

stats.text: 150,000 homes built across Latin America and the Caribbean

media.caption: TECHO operates in 18 countries

title: Kitchen Clerk to GoodTruck Brasil
description: GoodTruck was founded in 2016 in Curitiba, Paraná, with the goal of bringing food from where there's surplus to where there's shortage. Through various projects in partnership with distributors and supermarkets, the organization promotes volunteer engagement to reduce food waste and fight hunger.
experiences: Volunteering activities focused on food waste reduction campaign and meal distribution

title: Developer Volunteer at Freehelper
description: Freehelper is a platform that connects NGOs and volunteers. Currently building an intranet/backoffice platform for ACCEF (Associação Centro de Convivência Espaço da Família), a social assistance organization that supports vulnerable families and communities.
experiences: Developing a comprehensive management platform for beneficiary registration and tracking
Building modules for volunteer coordination, asset inventory, and program scheduling
Implementing financial tracking and donation management features
Creating analytics dashboards and reporting tools

stats.text: Freehelper connects volunteers with 500+ NGOs across Brazil
